text: Dame Elizabeth Violet Blackadder, Mrs Houston, (24 September 1931 â€“ 23 August 2021)Scottish artist Dame Elizabeth Blackadder dies, BBC News, 24 August 2021 was a Scottish painter and printmaker. She was the first woman to be elected to both the Royal Scottish Academy and the Royal Academy. Her work can be seen at the Tate Gallery, the Scottish National Gallery of Modern Art, and the Museum of Modern Art in New York. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scottish painters Category:People from Edinburgh
title: Elizabeth Blackadder
